rewards.description: Kickoff the Overwatch Champions Series with special viewer rewards!  Watch 2 hours to get the Overwatch Champions Series 2025 Icon, 4 hours to get the Overwatch Champions Series 2025 Spray, 6 hours to get the Overwatch Champions Series 2025 Name Card, 8 hours to get the Overwatch Championship Series Away Weapon Charm, 10 hours to get the Overwatch Championship Series Home Baptiste Skin and 12 hours to get the Overwatch Championship Series Away Baptiste Skin.

rewards.description:
Celebrate Overwatch 2's biggest season yet with the launch of Season 15 by receiving drops watching any of your fav Overwatch creators. 

Watch a total of 12 hours to get the full Rainy Day Mei bundle and gift 2 subs to any OW streamer to receive Rainy Day Tracer skin!
rewards.name: Season 15 Launch

rewards.description:
There’s nothing a pirate on the Sea of Thieves likes more than free loot – and with Twitch Drops, you can claim some just by linking your Twitch account to your Sea of Thieves account and tuning in to our special events!        

Twitch Drops are free items awarded to players for watching participating streamers during promotional activities. Sign up now to be eligible for the latest Twitch Drops event!
rewards.name: S15: Launch Drops

timeBasedDrops.name: Voyage: Gilded Voyage of the Ancient Isles

rewards.description: Get cosmetics by watching Infestation streams. Rewards are going to get directly delivered to your account. Keep in mind, clothing will be learned automatically and it's not possible to get transferred. You also can earn these character clothes only once on each account. If you claimed the rewards and don't get anything in the game, make sure you check your connection between the Game and Twitch.
rewards.name: Valentines Day Part 2

rewards.description: Watch your favorite streamers and earn in-game rewards!

rewards.description:
Make sure you watch your favorite MARVEL SNAP Twitch streamers to earn Boosters, Credits, and a Premium Mystery Variant! Drops will be available from February 18-24th. Don’t miss out! 

- Watch 2 hours to earn: 65 Random Boosters
- Watch 4 hours to earn: 250 Credits
- Watch 6 hours to earn: Premium Mystery Variant
rewards.name: FEB 2025

rewards.description: Viewers will receive 50 Wandering Market Coins for each two hours spent viewing participating streams from February 18, 2025 until February 25, 2025 at 12:00 UTC. Rewards must be claimed while the Twitch Campaign is running in order to be received in-game.
rewards.name: OB3 Drops Week 2

rewards.description: Celebrate the 3rd anniversary of Lost Ark with these drops!
rewards.name: 3rd Anniversary Drop

rewards.description: The Handsaw is a trusty tool that goes through infected limbs as efficiently as through wood. Let’s cut right to the chase with it! Watch your favorite Dying Light 2: Stay Human streamers on Twitch to claim the new handy item for free.
rewards.name: Handsaw

rewards.description: Welcome one and all to Shell Shockers Twitch Drops 7!  During this event your viewers will have the ability to earn in-game items just by watching you play Shell Shockers. Ten exclusive, and rare desirable items are up for grabs and your viewers will be eager to get their hands on them. The first drop is rewarded after just 15 minutes and these items are only available through this event from Feb 19 -> March 5!   Link accounts, enable drops, then Stream Shell Shockers on Twitch during those dates to start the drops!
rewards.name: Twitch Drops 7 - Week 1

rewards.description: Get the Alluring Wreath and experience Kingdom Come: Deliverance II with style!
rewards.name: KCD2 Alluring Wreath

rewards.description: 🎮 Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  🕒 Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  💰 Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  🎈 Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  🌟 How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: Kakele Online February 2

rewards.description: Watch any stream on the Firaxis Games Twitch Channel for 15 minutes and claim the reward: Exploration Age Banner profile cosmetic

rewards.description: Starting in Split 1, Riot Games is introducing Twitch Subscriptions to select LoL Esports broadcast channels! This new initiative offers fans an enhanced viewing experience while providing direct support to their favorite leagues and teams. Subscribers with paid and gifted Tier 1 subscriptions will unlock exclusive in-game rewards through Twitch’s Drop Fest. Subscribers can earn the special “Why Though?” emote by subscribing to participating channels.
rewards.name: Subs Launch - Drop Fest 2

rewards.description: Once Human Valentine's Day Drops event will start from February 14, 2025 to March 11, 2025 (PT).  Connect your Once Human character and Twitch account to receive the reward. Watch a participating stream channel to join the activity. You need to watch Once Human for 3 hours to claim all the rewards. The rewards will be sent to your account in 24 hours.
rewards.name: Valentine's Day Drops

rewards.description: VALORANT Masters has landed in Bangkok! Eight teams from around the world face off in the first international event of the VALORANT Champions Tour 2025. Tune in to see pros turn into masters, this is the Dawn of the Duelist!

rewards.description: Subscribe or Gift a Sub to your favorite opted-in Destiny 2 streamer and receive the Heretical Halation Emblem! This Emblem will be available from 11 February at 9AM PT until 4 March at 9AM PT. You must link your Bungie account to Twitch to receive the Emblem. You can redeem the Emblem by logging into your Bungie.net account and going to the Partner Rewards section of the Code Redemption area.
